#summary About Movico

= What is Movico? =

Movico is not just another MVC framework for PHP. It is inspired by Java Server Faces principles and other enterprise frameworks such as Liferay Portal. It supports
 * Writing request-scoped and session-scoped backing beans
 * Writing XML views with rich JSF-like components (inputText, dataTable, ...)
 * Generating domain models, services and SQL from an entity definition file

== OO all the way ==

If you don't like to code object oriented this framework is not for you. Movico is 100% object oriented and the developer is obliged to write object oriented code.

== Support ==

Movico is written in PHP 5. It currently only supports MySQL.
